mapper.insert: /*ojc.board.repository.BoardMapper.setReport*/ INSERT INTO week_job_report ( WEEK_ID, SUBJECT, DEPT_CODE, CREATE_ID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, DELETE_YN ) VALUES ( DECODE((SELECT COUNT(WEEK_ID) FROM WEEK_JOB_REPORT WHERE 1=1 AND CREATE_ID = #{createId}), 0, #{createId}||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD')||'0001' , #{createId}|| TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || LPAD(TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(#{createId}||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD')||'0001', 11,4)) + 1), 4, '0')) , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || #{subject} , #{createId} , #{deptCode} , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , 'N' )

/*ojc.board.repository.BoardMapper.setReportD*/
INSERT INTO WEEK_JOB_DETAIL_REPORT ( WEEK_ID, WEEK_RP_JOB_CT, NX_WEEK_RP_JOB_CT, WEEK_PL_JOB_CT, NX_WEEK_PL_JOB_CT, CREATE_ID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, ETC_CT ) SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT WEEK_ID , #{weekRpJobCt} AS WEEK_RP_JOB_CT , #{nxWeekRpJobCt} AS NX_WEEK_RP_JOB_CT , #{weekPlJobCt} AS WEEK_PL_JOB_CT , #{nxWeekPlJobCt} AS NX_WEEK_PL_JOB_CT , CREATE_ID , CREATE_DATE , UPDATE_DATE , #{etcCt} AS ETC_CT FROM WEEK_JOB_REPORT WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC ) A WHERE 1=1 AND ROWNUM = 1

/*ojc.board.repository.BoardMapper.setReportImsi*/ INSERT INTO WEEK_JOB_REPORT_IMSI ( WEEK_ID, SUBJECT, DEPT_CODE, CREATE_ID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, DELETE_YN ) VALUES ( DECODE((SELECT COUNT(WEEK_ID) FROM WEEK_JOB_REPORT), 0, #{createId}||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD')||'0001' , #{createId}|| TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || LPAD(TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(#{createId}||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD')||'0001', 11,4)) + 1), 4, '0')) , #{createId} , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || #{subject} , #{deptCode} , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , 'N' )
